plot: In a world where compassion is a crime, what happens to our deepest emotions? One man falls in love, against all the rules - he must fight against all the odds.
title: Static
plot_es: In a world where compassion is a crime, what happens to our deepest emotions? One man falls in love, against all the rules - he must fight against all the odds.
plot_en: In a world where compassion is a crime, what happens to our deepest emotions? One man falls in love, against all the rules - he must fight against all the odds.
